subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Doug Martin ran for four touchdowns to help No. 6 Boise State defeat New Mexico State. Now the undefeated Broncos must wait to see if they are invited to a B.C.S. bowl.
snippet: Doug Martin ran for four touchdowns to help No. 6 Boise State defeat New Mexico State. Now the undefeated Broncos must wait to see if they are invited to a B.C.S. bowl.
